attributes.action: Either slash the price of  hotel quarantine to half or exclude all citizens.
attributes.additional_details: Millions of citizens and lawful residents are struggling to manage their both ends due to pandemic hit in the Great Britain as well as around the world. Nearly a million people lost their job and depending government benefits to their survival. In this painful situation, how they manage forced Hotel quarantine and the price for that? So our government look this compassionately and remove hotel quarantine for Citizens and lawful residents.
attributes.background: Government is the only agency to implement such actions and they system is fully responsible for its citizens and lawful residents. Secondly the government must support and help compassionately either exclude people from this forced and expensive way of quarantine.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

No hotel quarantine for UK citizens, permanent residents and their families: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571447

Fund free hotel quarantine and testing for all UK arrivals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575118
